description: This file configures the Angular application by setting up providers such as zone change detection, routing, and client hydration.

methods.name: provideZoneChangeDetection
methods.description: Configures Angular zone change detection strategy with event coalescing enabled.

methods.name: provideRouter
methods.description: Provides routing configuration for the application using route definitions.

methods.name: provideClientHydration
methods.description: Enables client-side hydration features, with event replay support.

methods.name: withEventReplay
methods.description: Configures event replay for hydration to ensure UI consistency.
